entries.definition: a playing card with a single spot on it, ranked as the highest card in its suit in most card games
entries.example: life had started dealing him aces again

entries.definition: a large heavy-bodied non-venomous snake occurring throughout the Old World tropics, killing prey by constriction and asphyxiation.
a low hill at the base of a mountain or mountain range
entries.example: the camp lies in the foothills of the Andes

entries.definition: (of a bird, bat, or insect) move through the air using wings
entries.example: he was sent flying by the tackle

entries.definition: treating serious issues with deliberately inappropriate humor
entries.example: he was facetious when we he said she didn't need a housekeeper anymore after her house burned down
santa claus is generally portrayed as a jolly figure

entries.definition: spending money or resources freely and recklessly; wastefully extravagant
entries.example: the prodigal son returned home empty-handed after running off with his father's fortune
